content: winter garden cowls knitting pattern finished sizes small cowl 11 5cm/4 5 high by 40cm/16 around medium cowl 25cm/9 75 high by 52cm/20 5 around large cowl 37cm/14 75 high by 65cm/25 5 around materials required 40cm/16 50cm/20 60cm/24 5 5mm/us 9 circular knitting needles 27m/30yds 140m/150yds 265m/290yds chunky knitting wool stitch marker to mark the beginning/end of the round optional darning needle to sew in ends notes skills needed are a cast on knitting in the round the knit stitch yarn forward pass stitch over and a cast off the pattern is written in a line by line format use a cast on/bind off with a little stretch i use the cable cast on and this stretchy non-flare bind off www thesprucecrafts com/stretchy-bind-off-stich-knitting-tutorial- 2115677 to alter size add/subtract in multiples of 2 stitches and 4 row gauge 17 stitches x 23 rounds = 10cm in pattern abbreviations k = knit yfwd = bring yarn to front of work between last stitch worked and next stitch to be worked pattern for small and medium size cowls cast on 68 88 stitches place marker and join in the round round 1 knit round 2 yfwd k2 pass the yfwd over the 2 knit stitches repeat to the end of the round repeat last 2 row 3 more times rounds 9-16 knit repeat the 16 round pattern 0 2 more time then rounds 1-9 once more bind off and sew in ends pattern for large cowl cast on 112 stitches place marker and join in the round round 1 knit round 2 yfwd k2 pass the yfwd over the 2 knit stitches repeat to the end of the round repeat last 2 row 5 more times rounds 13-24 knit repeat the 24 round pattern 4 more times then rounds 1-13 once more bind off and sew in ends
